name: Beaver's Bitesaw
description:
Backstory

Benji the Beaver and his trusty chainsaw are going to reclaim their backyard from the evil BlackBerry Bush monster. Time to start sawing!

Controls

Gamepad Recommended

Xbox Game Controller recommended (Shown on HUD display)

Credits

2D character art & Animation - Allyson Wilsey

Monster Design - Egil Thompson

3d Environments - Guy Akadet Yokchoo

Music - Jesse Clark

Programming - Shane Lillie

Textures - Shannon Juhr

Audio Design - Seth Gordon

Game Design / Generalist - Tien Tam

Tools & External Assets:

Unity game engine
